1.brief: a fly (especially one of a stinging nature)
death (natural or violent); concretely, the dead, their place or state (hades); figuratively, pestilence, ruin
to smell bad; figuratively, to be offensive morally
to gush forth; figuratively, to utter (good or bad words); specifically, to emit (a foul odor)
grease, especially liquid (as from the olive, often perfumed); figuratively, richness
properly, weight, but only figuratively in a good sense, splendor or copiousness
a little or few (often adverbial or compar.)

2.brief: the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
the right hand or side (leg, eye) of a person or other object (as the stronger and more dexterous); locally, the south
the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
properly, fat, i.e. (figuratively) stupid or silly
properly, dark (as enveloped), i.e. the north; hence (by orientation), the left hand

3.brief: properly, assemblage; used only adverbially also, even, yea, though; often repeated as correl. both...and
a road (as trodden); figuratively, a course of life or mode of action, often adverb
to walk (in a great variety of applications, literally and figuratively)
the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)

he (she or it); only expressed when emphatic or without a verb; also (intensively) self, or (especially with the article) the same; sometimes (as demonstrative) this or that; occasionally (instead of copula) as or are

4.brief: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not

wind; by resemblance breath, i.e. a sensible (or even violent) exhalation; figuratively, life, anger, unsubstantiality; by extension, a region of the sky; by resemblance spirit, but only of a rational being (including its expression and functions)
to ascend, intransitively (be high) or actively (mount); used in a great variety of senses, primary and secondary, literal and figurative
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
properly, a standing, i.e. a spot; but used widely of a locality (general or specific); also (figuratively) of a condition (of body or mind)
not (the qualified negation, used as a deprecative); once (Job 24:25) as a noun, nothing
to deposit; by implication, to allow to stay
(by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
properly, curative, i.e. literally (concretely) a medicine, or (abstractly) a cure; figuratively (concretely) deliverance, or (abstractly) placidity
to deposit; by implication, to allow to stay
great (in any sense); hence, older; also insolent

5.brief: there is or are (or any other form of the verb to be, as may suit the connection)
bad or (as noun) evil (natural or moral)
to see, literally or figuratively (in numerous applications, direct and implied, transitive, intransitive and causative)
the bottom (as depressed); only adverbially, below (often with prepositional prefix underneath), in lieu of, etc.
the sun; by implication, the east; figuratively, a ray, i.e. (architectural) a notched battlement
to go (causatively, bring) out, in a great variety of applications, literally and figuratively, direct and proxim.
the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)
potent; concretely, a prince or warrior

6.brief: to give, used with greatest latitude of application (put, make, etc.)
altitude, i.e. concretely (an elevated place), abstractly (elevation, figuratively (elation), or adverbially (aloft)
abundant (in quantity, size, age, number, rank, quality)
properly, to sit down (specifically as judge. in ambush, in quiet); by implication, to dwell, to remain; causatively, to settle, to marry

7.brief: to see, literally or figuratively (in numerous applications, direct and implied, transitive, intransitive and causative)
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
a horse (as leaping); also a swallow (from its rapid flight)
a head person (of any rank or class)
to walk (in a great variety of applications, literally and figuratively)
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
the earth (at large, or partitively a land)

8.brief: properly, to pry into; by implication, to delve, to explore
to fall, in a great variety of applications (intransitive or causative, literal or figurative)
to break out (in many applications, direct and indirect, literal and figurative)
a circumvallation; by implication, an inclosure
to strike with a sting (as a serpent); figuratively, to oppress with interest on a loan

9.brief: properly, to pull up, especially the tent-pins, i.e. start on ajourney
properly, to carve, i.e. fabricate or fashion; hence (in a bad sense) to worry, pain or anger
to cleave; generally, to rend, break, rip or open
a tree (from its firmness); hence, wood (plural sticks)
properly, to cut, i.e. damage; also to grow (causatively, make) poor

10.brief: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
iron (as cutting); by extension, an iron implement

he (she or it); only expressed when emphatic or without a verb; also (intensively) self, or (especially with the article) the same; sometimes (as demonstrative) this or that; occasionally (instead of copula) as or are
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)
to be (causatively, make) light, literally (swift, small, sharp, etc.) or figuratively (easy, trifling, vile, etc.)
probably a force, whether of men, means or other resources; an army, wealth, virtue, valor, strength
to be strong; by implication, to prevail, act insolently
by implication, to be acceptable; also to succeed or prosper

11.brief: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
to strike with a sting (as a serpent); figuratively, to oppress with interest on a loan
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
properly, a whisper, i.e. by implication, (in a good sense) a private prayer, (in a bad one) an incantation; concretely, an amulet
a non-entity; generally used as a negative particle
a master; hence, a husband, or (figuratively) owner (often used with another noun in modifications of this latter sense)
the tongue (of man or animals), used literally (as the instrument of licking, eating, or speech), and figuratively (speech, an ingot, a fork of flame, a cove of water)

12.brief: a word; by implication, a matter (as spoken of) or thing; adverbially, a cause
the mouth (as the means of blowing), whether literal or figurative (particularly speech); specifically edge, portion or side; adverbially (with preposition) according to
graciousness, i.e. subjective (kindness, favor) or objective (beauty)
the lip (as a natural boundary); by implication, language; by analogy, a margin (of a vessel, water, cloth, etc.)
properly, fat, i.e. (figuratively) stupid or silly
to make away with (specifically by swallowing); generally, to destroy

13.brief: a word; by implication, a matter (as spoken of) or thing; adverbially, a cause
the mouth (as the means of blowing), whether literal or figurative (particularly speech); specifically edge, portion or side; adverbially (with preposition) according to
the last or end, hence, the future; also posterity
the mouth (as the means of blowing), whether literal or figurative (particularly speech); specifically edge, portion or side; adverbially (with preposition) according to
bad or (as noun) evil (natural or moral)

14.brief: a word; by implication, a matter (as spoken of) or thing; adverbially, a cause
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles

to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing); used in a great variety of senses, figuratively, literally, euphemistically and inferentially (including observation, care, recognition; and causatively, instruction, designation, punishment, etc.)
ruddy i.e. a human being (an individual or the species, mankind, etc.)

properly, interrogative what? (including how? why? when?); but also exclamation, what! (including how!), or indefinitely what (including whatever, and even relatively, that which); often used with prefixes in various adverbial or conjunctive senses
to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
properly, the hind part; generally used as an adverb or conjunction, after (in various senses)
who? (occasionally, by a peculiar idiom, of things); also (indefinitely) whoever; often used in oblique construction with prefix or suffix

properly, to front, i.e. stand boldly out opposite; by implication (causatively), to manifest; figuratively, to announce (always by word of mouth to one present); specifically, to expose, predict, explain, praise

15.brief: toil, i.e. wearing effort; hence, worry, wheth. of body or mind
properly, fat, i.e. (figuratively) stupid or silly
properly, to gasp; hence, to be exhausted, to tire, to toil
who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles

to walk (literally or figuratively); causatively, to carry (in various senses)
near, with or among; often in general, to
a city (a place guarded by waking or a watch) in the widest sense (even of a mere encampment or post)

16.brief: the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
(concretely) a boy (as active), from the age of infancy to adolescence; by implication, a servant; also (by interch. of sex), a girl (of similar latitude in age)
a head person (of any rank or class)
properly, dawn (as the break of day); generally, morning

17.brief: happiness; only in masculine plural construction as interjection, how happy!
the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
a son (as a builder of the family name), in the widest sense (of literal and figurative relationship, including grandson, subject, nation, quality or condition, etc., (like father or brother), etc.)
properly, white or pure (from the cleansing or shining power of fire; hence (figuratively) noble (in rank)
a head person (of any rank or class)
time, especially (adverb with preposition) now, when, etc.
force (literally or figuratively); by implication, valor, victory
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles

18.brief: to tumble (in ruins); figuratively, to perish
properly, something meeting, i.e. a frame (of timbers)
a hand (the open one (indicating power, means, direction, etc.),
to drip; by implication, to weep
a house (in the greatest variation of applications, especially family, etc.)

19.brief: to do or make, in the broadest sense and widest application
food (for man or beast), especially bread, or grain (for making it)
probably to brighten up, i.e. (figuratively) be (causatively, make) blithe or gleesome
alive; hence, raw (flesh); fresh (plant, water, year), strong; also (as noun, especially in the feminine singular and masculine plural) life (or living thing), whether literally or figuratively
silver (from its pale color); by implication, money
properly, to eye or (generally) to heed, i.e. pay attention; by implication, to respond; by extension to begin to speak; specifically to sing, shout, testify, announce
properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)

intelligence or consciousness
a king
not (the qualified negation, used as a deprecative); once (Job 24:25) as a noun, nothing
to be (causatively, make) light, literally (swift, small, sharp, etc.) or figuratively (easy, trifling, vile, etc.)
an apartment (usually literal)
a bed (figuratively, a bier); abstractly, sleep; by euphemism, carnal intercourse

rich, whether literal or figurative (noble)

the sky (as aloft; the dual perhaps alluding to the visible arch in which the clouds move, as well as to the higher ether where the celestial bodies revolve)

properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
a voice or sound
a master; hence, a husband, or (figuratively) owner (often used with another noun in modifications of this latter sense)
